QuestData.Title: Beast Control
QuestData.Description:
The Grove of Terror's dredbats have become aggressive due to the lack of anima caused by the drought.
This is a formal request to cull their numbers. We must re-establish dominance over our creations.
-Flockmaster Sergio
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Dredbats in the Grove of Terror.
QuestData.RewardText: The balance is returning. Please accept this payment on behalf of myself and the other keepers of this place.
